channel.title: Comments on: Renegade Hinduism Scholar Featured In Norton’s Anthology of World Religions
channel.description: E-SUPPLEMENT TO THE JOURNAL FOR CULTURAL AND RELIGIOUS THEORY

item.title: By: Venkatesh Salpala
item.dc:creator: Venkatesh Salpala
item.description: It is great hounour for him for being featured in world’s famous Norton’s Anthology of World Religions. It is needless to say that the struggle of Kancha Ilaiah with indomitable spirit ignites the minds of students and youth who hail from dalitbahujan background. He is the role model for present generation. His way of analysis things is innovative, contextual and demystifies the so-called Hindutva forces. However, He is the champion who fight against unproductive parasites by proposing spiritual democracy.
